creator: mmodrall@glgroup.com
text:
Here's a simple stylesheet that does a decent job translating nunit-style xml 
output to junit format.  This is useful when ant is used in conjunction with 
CruiseControl and CC is trying to merge outputs for a status determination.  CC 
already knows how to read junit output but not nunit

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: Mark, this may be a silly question (and it may be even more silly to sit on it for eighteen months): you intend to contribute this stylesheet for us to distribute it under the terms of the Apache License, right?
CANTFIX without the right to distribute it.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
